pageContext.claim: “We've really produced. You know, last time I told you what we're going to do. Now you have the steel mills roaring again.”
pageContext.analysis: It's a big stretch to say steel mills are suddenly "roaring again" after Trump imposed steel tariffs. Trade and economic experts say the tariffs could cost U.S. jobs. Although some investments have been announced, the steel industry was not going out of business, as Trump suggests. Big integrated steel mills had trouble competing with more nimble and efficient mini-mills.
